tool.name: OTB.TileFusion
tool.description: Fusion of an image made of several tile files.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayil True output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.TileFusion il $il cols $cols rows $rows out $out prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: il
param.label: Input images to concatenate (in lexicographic order, for instance : (0,0) (1,0) (0,1) (1,1)).
param.help: Input images to concatenate (in lexicographic order, for instance : (0,0) (1,0) (0,1) (1,1)). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: cols
param.label: Number of columns in the tile array
param.help: Number of columns in the tile array

param.name: rows
param.label: Number of rows in the tile array
param.help: Number of rows in the tile array

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Automatically mosaic a set of non overlapping tile files into a single image. Images must have a matching number of bands and they must be listed in lexicographic order.
